episodes.title: Death in the Jungle w Candace Fleming
episodes.description: Join "Mind Over Murder" co-hosts Bill Thomas and Kristin Dilley as they discuss the new book "Death in the Jungle" with author Candace Fleming. The book tells the bizarre story of the People's Temple, a religious organization which was responsible for the murder of more than 900 temple members in Jonestown, Guyana in November 1978. The temple, which many critics said ultimately became a cult, was led by charismatic leader Jim Jones. episodes.title: BONUS: The Doomsday Mother: Lori Vallow, Chad Daybell, and the End of an American Family
episodes.description: Bestselling true crime author John Glatt join "Mind Over Murder" hosts Bill Thomas and Kristin Dilley for a discussion of his new book, "The Doomsday Mother: Lori Vallow, Chad Daybell, and the End of an American Family." This fascinating story gives the background on how a couple's obsessions led them to establish a cult that led them to madness and multiple murder. Lori Vallow is currently on trial for multiple murders, and her husband's trial will follow.
